actions.text: Amendment SA 1227, under the order of 6/19/2013, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 9. Record Vote Number: 157.

Amendment SA 1227 proposed by Senator Heller. (consideration: CR S4631-4632, S4661; text: CR S4631) To include a representative from the Southwestern State of Nevada on the Southern Border Security Commission.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1227, under the order of 6/19/2013, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 9. Record Vote Number: 157.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1227, under the order of 6/19/2013, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 9. Record Vote Number: 157.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1227 proposed by Senator Heller.

purpose: To include a representative from the Southwestern State of Nevada on the Southern Border Security Commission.
